rdf:Description.orkg:hasTitle: SciKGTeX - A Package to Semantically Annotate Contributions in Scientific Publications

orkg:ResearchContribution.orkg_property:objective: workflow for authors of scientific documents to specify their contributions
automatically upload contributions to a knowledge graph
orkg:ResearchContribution.orkg_property:result: score of 79 out of 100 on the System Usability Scale
7 minutes on average to annotate the main contributions
orkg:ResearchContribution.orkg_property:conclusion: SciKGTeX simplifies the process of manual semantic annotation of research contributions in scientific articles. Our workflow demonstrates how a scientific knowledge graph can automatically ingest research contributions from document metadata.
